description: To remove the search box from the taskbar in Windows 10, right-click on an empty space on the taskbar. Then, select 'Taskbar settings' from the context menu. Next, scroll down to the 'Taskbar items' section and toggle the switch next to 'Search' to off. This action will effectively disable the search feature from the taskbar, addressing any unwanted changes that occurred after the October updates. These steps can restore the taskbar to the preferred configuration of users who have previously disabled the search functionality.
